name: Cision
description: Cision is an action platformer developed by Team Fifteen Dollars as our final project for our Game Design Bachelor's program at Full Sail University. It was created in about four months, with development starting on 01/03/2022 and ending on 05/02/2022. It was created with the reference game being Ghostrunner, so if you enjoy fast-paced gameplay, give Cision a try, and please feel free to tell us what you think.
